description:

	- (ok,None) = target.delegatecall(targetData) (contracts/l2/L2GovernanceRelay.sol#64)

description: L1Gateway._handleInitiateDeposit(address,address,uint256) (contracts/l1/L1Gateway.sol#72-80) ignores return value by l1ERC20.transferFrom(_from,escrow,_amount) (contracts/l1/L1Gateway.sol#79)
L1Gateway._handleFinalizeWithdrawal(address,uint256) (contracts/l1/L1Gateway.sol#82-85) ignores return value by l1ERC20.transferFrom(escrow,_to,_amount) (contracts/l1/L1Gateway.sol#84)
DaiEchidnaTest.transfer(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#59-66) ignores return value by dai.transfer(holder,wad) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#63)
DaiEchidnaTest.transferFrom(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#69-76) ignores return value by dai.transferFrom(holder,address(this),wad) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#73)
ApproveLike (contracts/l1/L1Escrow.sol#19-21) has incorrect ERC20 function interface:ApproveLike.approve(address,uint256) (contracts/l1/L1Escrow.sol#20)

DaiEchidnaTest.burn(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#49-56) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(holder) == sub(holderBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#54)

DaiEchidnaTest.burn(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#49-56) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- holderBalance == 0 (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#52)

DaiEchidnaTest.mint(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#39-46) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(holder) == add(holderBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#44)

DaiEchidnaTest.transfer(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#59-66) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(address(this)) == sub(thisBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#64)

DaiEchidnaTest.transfer(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#59-66) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(holder) == add(holderBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#65)

DaiEchidnaTest.transfer(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#59-66) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- thisBalance == 0 (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#62)

DaiEchidnaTest.transferFrom(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#69-76) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(holder) == sub(holderBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#74)

DaiEchidnaTest.transferFrom(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#69-76) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(address(this)) == add(thisBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#75)

DaiEchidnaTest.transferFrom(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#69-76) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- holderBalance == 0 (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#72)

EscrowEchidnaTest.deposit(uint256) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#87-97) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(DaiLike(dai).balanceOf(address(this)) == add(thisBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#93)

EscrowEchidnaTest.deposit(uint256) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#87-97) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(DaiLike(dai).balanceOf(address(escrow)) == add(escrowBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#95)

Reentrancy in EscrowEchidnaTest.constructor() (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#63-74):
	External calls:
	- dai = create.deploy() (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#65)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- escrow = new L1Escrow() (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#67)
	- gate1 = new L1Gateway(TokenLike(dai),address(gate2),address(messenger),address(escrow)) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#70)
	- gate2 = new L2Gateway(address(messenger),address(oDai)) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#69)
	- messenger = new MockMessenger() (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#68)
	- oDai = new Dai() (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#66)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [EscrowEchidnaTest.constructor()](contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#L63-L74):
	External calls:
	- [dai = create.deploy()](contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#L65)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [escrow = new L1Escrow()](contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#L67)
	- [gate1 = new L1Gateway(TokenLike(dai),address(gate2),address(messenger),address(escrow))](contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#L70)
	- [gate2 = new L2Gateway(address(messenger),address(oDai))](contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#L69)
	- [messenger = new MockMessenger()](contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#L68)
	- [oDai = new Dai()](contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#L66)

description:
Dai.permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (contracts/l2/dai.sol#184-208) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp <= deadline,Dai/permit-expired) (contracts/l2/dai.sol#185)
markdown:
